mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(post_title, post_content, post_created_date, post_hit, post_category, post_author, post_img_path) values (#{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{postCreatedDate}, #{postHit}, #{postCategory}, #{postAuthor}, #{postImgPath})
mapper.select: select p.*, a.account_id, a.account_profile_path from post as p inner join account a on p.post_author = a.account_seq order by p.post_seq desc limit 10 offset #{pageNum}

select p.*, a.account_id, a.account_profile_path from post as p inner join account a on p.post_author = a.account_seq inner join categories c on p.post_category = c.categories_seq where c.categories_seq = #{categorySeq} order by p.post_seq desc limit 10 offset #{pageNum}
select count(*) from post inner join categories c on c.categories_seq = post.post_category where categories_seq = #{categorySeq}
